title: What about Mics?
body: I bought a mic for LoL thinking I could talk to other people but I can't find the ability to talk to other people

replies.body: As Wolfess mentioned, there's no official voice feature currently.  We're not oppose to you using other sources of voice comms, so have at it if you want to talk with friends!  Let me know if you have any questions.
League does not currently have a voice chat function.
